EN:
Pickup this treasure in a five -star restaurant Wine Bar!The wine list selected by the champion sommelier allows tonight to have a professional, unique and unforgettable experience.

The best way to relax from FRIDAY NIGHT is to drink at Wine Bar and find the popular bar on Dazhi Neihu Lake-PARK90.

Located on the 4th floor of the five -star Meifu Hotel, the decoration must be the same as the level of a five -star hotel. When you enter the store, the dark -colored low -key luxury, elegant taste design, soft lights, sofas and comfortable jazz music , Immediately make people relax and enter the happy mood.

The low bar of the bar is as long as one person order a glass of wine, which is very affordable and affordable. It opens a thick wine list. From the new world to the old world, the popular national production areas France, Italy, Australia, and New Zealand are all included.It is said that the wine list is carefully selected by the world -renowned critics and professional sommeliers who won the International Award. As soon as you open the wine list, you feel that the whole wine list is the part of the Wine by the Glass, because the two of us, Generally you can only open 2 bottles. When you see a single cup, you can satisfy drinking a lot of different styles and drinking different wines in one night. Diverse and very exciting. The sommelier in the store KEVIN is very professional and enthusiastic about we have introduced a lot of specialty wines. Each one has a unique aroma and taste. Let us have a Wine Bar experience tonight. Unique and unforgettable.

Overall, this bar is very worthwhile.Whether it is a party with friends or taste wine alone, this is a good choice.It is recommended that everyone must experience it in person, I believe you will be attracted by its charm.

Usually it is also a service -oriented job. No matter how better the service attitude is, it is a bit uncomfortable. It is worth learning.
The introduction of the wine is very careful, and you can find what you want to drink very efficiently!Push!IntersectionIntersection
